title: 43 Acre Lagoon Front Land For Sale On The Kalpitiya Main Road
details:
Property Ref:Lagoon-43

This is a beautiful 43 acre lagoon front estate facing the Puttalam lagoon at Kalpitiya. While one side faces the serine lagoon, the access to the property is by the main road of Kalpitiya.

Nearly half of the land is populated with coconut plantation and the property boasts a wide lagoon frontage approximately spanning a kilometer. The lush vegetation and the green patchy grass on the land soothes once eye and brings a sense of calmness.

Due to ongoing development in Kalpitiya region and as Kalpitiya area has been demarcated as a tourism zone, it adds extra value for the property. The land is recommended ideal for any tourism related or commercial projects.

Now available for immediate sale with-

- Clear Deed And Title (Sinnakkara - eligible for bank loans)
- Electricity
- Drinking Water ( Tube Well )
- Good Road Access ( Main Road)

Asking price is LKR 2.M/Acre

If interested please contact us on 0094 77 77 33 823 for further details

Thanks for looking :)
